tit.e: Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring
Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring
tit.cmt: flower は削除してもよいと判断しました。

sen.j: るり渓温泉（るりけいおんせん）は、京都府南丹市園部町（旧国丹波国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Sonobe-cho Nantan City Kyoto Prefecture (Tanba Province under the ancient administrative division).
Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Sonobe-cho Nantan City Kyoto Prefecture (Tanba Province under the ancient administrative division).
Rurikei River Valley Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Sonobe-cho, Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture (Tanba Province under the ancient administrative division).
sen.cmt: カンマを追加しました。Flower を削除しました。

sen.j: 源泉が二つあり「るり渓高原温泉」「るり渓フラワー温泉」とされる。
sen.e: It has two hot spring sauces; one is "Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring" and the other is "Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring. "
It has two hot spring sources; one is "Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring" and the other is "Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring. "
It has two hot spring sources; one is 'Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring' and the other is 'Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring.'

sen.j: このうち、るり渓高原温泉は国民保養温泉地である。
sen.e: Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring is designated as People's Recreation Spa.
Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring is designated the People's Recreation Spa.
Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring is designated the People's Recreation Spa.

sen.j: 漢字表記する場合は「瑠璃渓」となるが、ほとんどひらがな表記されている。
sen.e: It can be written in kanji characters but commonly written in the hiragana.
It can be written in kanji characters but is commonly written in hiragana.
It can be written in kanji characters but is commonly written in hiragana.

sen.j: 能勢電鉄日生中央駅またはJR山陰本線園部駅からバス。
sen.e: The bus service is available from Nissei Chuo Station of Nose Electric Railway Co.,Ltd. and Sonobe Station of the JR Sanin Main Line.
Bus service is available from Nissei Chuo Station of Nose Electric Railway Co.,Ltd. and Sonobe Station of the JR Sanin Main Line.
Bus service is available from Nissei Chuo Station of Nose Electric Railway Co., Ltd. and Sonobe Station of the JR Sanin Main Line.
sen.cmt: Co., Ltd. としました（スペース挿入）。

sen.j: または国道173号線で大阪京都府境から東へすぐ。
sen.e: Or drive east for a short while from the border between Kyoto and Osaka Prefectures along the National Highway Route No. 173.
It can also be reached by driving east for a short while from the border between Kyoto and Osaka Prefectures along the National Highway Route No. 173.
It can also be reached by driving east for a short while from the border between Kyoto and Osaka Prefectures along the National Route 173.
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 成分にラドンを含む放射能泉である。
sen.e: Radioactive springs containing radon
Radioactive springs containing radon
Radioactive springs containing radon

sen.j: 浴場には2つの泉源から導入された浴槽が隣接しており、片足ずつまたがることができる。
sen.e: Two bath tabs of water from different sources are laid out so close to each other that you can put the right foot in one and left foot in the other.
Two bath tubs of water from different sources are laid out so close to each other that you can put the right foot in one and the left foot in the other.
Two bath tubs of water from different sources are laid out so close to each other that you can put the right foot in one and the left foot in the other.

sen.j: 温度の差は小さいが、成分の差で皮膚に受ける感触の違いは大きい。
sen.e: You do not feel a great difference in the temperature but in a touch because they are different in constituents of water.
While the temperature difference isn't significant, there is a difference to the touch due to the different constitution of the water.
While the temperature difference isn't significant, there is a difference to the touch due to the different constitution of the water.

sen.j: るり渓高原温泉：単純放射線温泉、低張性-弱アルカリ性-低温泉
sen.e: Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring::simple radioactive hot spring, hypotonic=alkalescent=low temperature
Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring::simple radioactive hot spring, hypotonic=alkalescent=low temperature
Rurikei River Valley Highland Hot Spring: simple radioactive hot spring; hypotonic, alkalescent and low temperature
sen.cmt: 「低張性-弱アルカリ性-低温泉」を、hypotonic, alkalescent and low temperature と表記しました。

sen.j: るり渓フラワー温泉：単純弱放射線冷鉱泉、低張性-中性低張性-冷鉱泉
sen.e: Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring: simple weak radioactive, cold mineral spring, hypotonic=neutral hypotonic=cold mineral spring
Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring: simple weak radioactive, cold mineral spring, hypotonic=neutral hypotonic=cold mineral spring
Rurikei River Valley Flower Hot Spring: simple weak radioactive, cold mineral spring; hypotonic, neutral hypotonic and cold mineral spring

sen.j: 日帰り入浴施設があり、宿泊施設が1軒ある。
sen.e: There is a public bath facility for non-staying visitors and one lodging..
There is a public bath facility for day trip visitors and one inn for lodging.
There is a public bath facility for day trip visitors and one inn for lodging.

sen.j: 京都府立るり渓自然公園の中にある。
sen.e: It is within Kyoto Prefectural Ruri-kei Valley Natural Park.
Both are located within Kyoto Prefectural Ruri-kei Valley Natural Park.
Both are located within Kyoto Prefectural Ruri-kei Valley Natural Park.

sen.j: 2000年5月11日、環境省公示により国民保養温泉地に指定。
sen.e: On May 11, 2000, it was designated as People's Recreation Spa by notification of the Ministry of the Environment.
May 11, 2000: It was designated as People's Recreation Spa by notification of the Ministry of the Environment.
sen.cmt: "On May 11, 2000, it"→"May 11, 2000: It"に変更しました。
sen.e: May 11, 2000: It was designated as People's Recreation Spa by notification of the Ministry of the Environment.
